item.title: Charlie Kirk’s shooting death exposes security gaps at political events
item.description: Security experts are questioning the protection provided to Charlie Kirk at the Utah college where he was fatally shot.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s casket flown from Utah to Arizona aboard Air Force Two Thursday
item.description: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk’s casket to be flown from Utah to Arizona aboard Air Force Two Thursday, AP source says.

item.title: A taste of Fall for the Suncoast? Kind of.
item.description: It may feel a bit "crisp" this weekend during the morning and evening.

item.description: The community is invited to New Paddler Day, on Saturday, September 13th.

item.title: I-75 southbound traffic snarled due to trailer rollover
item.description: I-75 has a nearly 7 mile delay approaching a crash at MM-202.

item.title: Time dwindling to file insurance claims for hurricane damage

item.title: Suncoast communities remember 9/11 with morning ceremonies
item.description: Across the Suncoast and the nation, community members came together in solemn tribute.

item.title: FAMU cancels on-campus classes Friday after nationwide threats toward HBCUs
item.description: Florida A&M University is canceling on-campus classes on Friday due to recent threats to HBCUs around the country.

item.title: UPDATE: Robbery suspect in Bradenton SWAT shooting identified
item.description: “This was a violent suspect who was not going to go down quietly,” Sheriff Rick Wells said.
